edu.northwestern.at.morphadorner.server.converters

Class AliasingListConverter

  • java.lang.Object
    • edu.northwestern.at.morphadorner.server.converters.AliasingListConverter
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    com.thoughtworks.xstream.converters.Converter, com.thoughtworks.xstream.converters.ConverterMatcher
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    AbbreviationsListConverter, AdornedSentencesConverter, AntonymsListConverter, LanguageListConverter, ListOfListOfTokensConverter, MeldedSentencesListConverter, RelatedSpellingsListConverter, SegmentTextsListConverter, SentencesListConverter, SuggestionsListConverter, SummarySentencesListConverter, SynonymsListConverter

    public class AliasingListConverter
extends java.lang.Object
implements com.thoughtworks.xstream.converters.Converter
    Change the alias of an element in a list.

    Minor modification of the sample code posted by Joerg Schaible in a September 19, 2008 message on the java.xstream.user message board.
